definitions.definition: The value of six old pence ; half of a shilling ; or one-fortieth of a pound sterling .
A former British coin worth sixpence, first minted in 1551.
examples: Have you got two sixpences for a shilling?

main_definition: ( obsolete , British , uncountable ) The value of six old pence ; half of a shilling ; or one-fortieth of a pound sterling .
secondary_definitions: ( historical ) A former British coin worth sixpence, first minted in 1551.
